meanings.definition: A spherical bacterium that typically occurs in irregular clusters.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the scientist observed the tiny micrococci in a cluster.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the micrococci as the cause of the infection.
meanings.sent3: The micrococci gathered together for a tiny party under the lens.
meanings.sent4: Like a group of tiny planets, the micrococci clustered together in the sample.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a model to show the students how micrococci look under magnification.

meanings.definition: A type of bacteria that is commonly found on the skin and mucous membranes of humans.
meanings.sent1: The dermatologist explained the role of micrococci in skin health to the patient.
meanings.sent2: Micrococci play a vital role in maintaining the balance of bacteria on our skin.
meanings.sent3: The micrococci on the skin whispered secrets to each other about their human hosts.
meanings.sent4: The micrococci on the mucous membranes stood guard like tiny protectors.
meanings.sent5: The researcher discovered a new species of micrococci living on human skin during the study.
